text: Eighteen patients with cervical cancer who underwent laparoscopic pelvic lymphadenectomy during pregnancy (6 to 23 weeks of gestation) were analyzed by Favero et al.1865.All laparoscopic procedures were successfully completed without surgery-associated mortality, morbidity, or conversion to laparotomy.
